name: SGJ #7: Robot Tag
description:
Created for The Sunday Game Jam #7

Continuing the month of LÖVE, a short multiplayer game for 2-4 players. 

Inspired by games such as "Move or Die", this game is a game of Tag between robots. Whoever spends the least amount of time tagged wins. 

The player who's "it" is identified by hovering skull. 

YouTube video:

GitHub page:

https://github.com/gabrielnaves/SGJ_7-Robot-Tag

Basically I wanted to make a "Super" game of Tag, but the 24-hour development time did not allow for much on the ~Super~ parts, but I hope you like the general idea, despite the simple implementation.

Hit me up if you have any troubles executing the game :)
